sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import OnboardingSideBar from "../components/OnboardingSideBar"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { getIdentificationFields } from "../clients/onboarding"; const IdentificationUpload = (props: any) => { const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm(); const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false); const token = useAuthStore((state) => state.accessToken); const { isLoading, error, data } = useQuery("data", () => getIdentificationFields(token) ); const onSubmit = (data: any) => { setSubmitted(true); setTimeout(function () { setSubmitted(false); props.history.push("/application"); }, 2000); }; return ( <>

UPLOAD YOUR ID

{/*

We hate to ask, but regulations mandate us to.
Your BVN is safe with us!

*/} {submitted ? ( <>

Sent successfully

Account details created successfully

) : ( <>
)}
); }; export default IdentificationUpload;
